Xiamen Leading Optics Co., Ltd. specializes in the design and manufacture of imaging lenses. The company offers a wide range of optical products including night vision lenses, automotive image lenses, ruggedized lenses, and various other lenses for applications in security, medical, and consumer electronics. With over 16 years of experience, the company has developed more than 1500 optical solutions and holds 67 patented technologies. Xiamen Leading Optics is committed to continuous innovation and aims to be a leading global optical solution provider.

厦门领冠光学有限公司专注于成像镜头的设计和制造。该公司提供各种光学产品，包括夜视镜头、汽车图像镜头、防震镜头以及用于安全、医疗和消费电子等领域的其他各种镜头。凭借16年的经验，该公司已开发出1500多种光学解决方案，拥有67项专利技术。厦门领冠光学致力于不断创新，并力争成为领先的全球光学解决方案提供商。
